DOC.brief_summary: Treatment of exercise-induced laryngomalacia (an obstruction of larynx during physical activity) in elite athletes using two different treatments. The study is randomized with control groups.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Exercise-induced Laryngomalacia in Elite Athletes
DOC.criteria: Laryngoscopically verified EIL, Elite athlete for a minimum of 1 year and continuing for a minimum 6 months after start of treatment Has to be able to run on treadmill
